author: marinakolosova
body:
Backport of :
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/41655

PR description:

Modified the PNet monitoring for AK4 and AK8 jets:

Replaced AK4 CHS jets with Puppi
Renamed the paths to match the ones for 2023 (JIRA: [CMSHLT-2695](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2695), [CMSHLT-2759](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-2759)
Added PNet monitoring in offlineHLTSourceOnAOD (PNet DQM not processed otherwise)
PR validation:

Went through the validation procedure described in [HLTValidationAndDQM](https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/HLTValidationAndDQM) to produce the PNet DQM histograms.
title: Backport: Replaced AK8 and AK8 paths for ParticleNet DQMOffline monitoring for 2023 (131X)
